T02D1843:20b-21: bdag nyid do // de la rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis lha rnams bsdus nas /
T02D1843:20b-22: bud med rnams dgu sku las bton nas /
T02D1843:20b-23: bstims pa'i yum gang yin pa de ni ma'i bdag nyid yin te /
T02D1843:20b-25: na chung gzhon nu mig bzang btsal //
T02D1843:20b-27: 'di ni gsang ba'i dbang gi yum du shes par bya'o //
T02D1843:20b-28: rin chen 'byung gnas na chung mchog / ces 'byung ba 'di ni sring mo yin te /
T02D1843:20b-29: sems 'od 'bar hos zhu ba'i dus kyi chags par byed pa'i yum yin te /
T02D1843:20b-30: shes rab kyi dbang gi yum yin pas //
T02D1843:20b-31: rin chen rnams ni kun la dbul //
T02D1843:20b-32: zhas smos te slob ma snod dang ldan pa la shes rab ye shes kyi dbang sbyin pa'o //
T02D1843:20b-33: rin chen sna bdun yang dbang bskur ba'i dus kyi dbu rgyan dang /
T02D1843:20b-39: mgur chu rnams kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D1843:20b-40: bzhin bzangs shin tu gzugs mdzes pa'i //
T02D1843:20b-41: na chung skal ba mchog bzang la //
T02D1843:21a-1: ba ni bu mo yin te /
T02D1843:21a-2: rdo rje 'dzin chen por bzhengs pa'i yum ste 'di
T02D1843:21a-3: ni gzhan la dbang bskur ba'i yum du 'dod do
T02D1843:21a-4: // de ltar na le'u 'di'i don ni 'di ltar 'gyur te /
T02D1843:21a-5: dang po na chung gzhon nu zhes bya ba la
T02D1843:21a-6: sogs pas rdo rje sems dpa' 'dod chags chen po'i
T02D1843:21a-7: ting nge 'dzin gyis bud med rnam dgu spros nas
T02D1843:21a-8: thim pa'i yum ni byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D1843:21a-9: me tog dgu lha mo dgur byin gyis brlab pa yan chad do //
T02D1843:21a-11: dpag chad brgya yi khyon tsam la //
T02D1843:21a-12: zhes bya ba la sogs pas rin po che'i gzhal
T02D1843:21a-13: yas khang 'dod pa'i longs spyod lnga'i rgyan gyis brgyan
T02D1843:21a-14: pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' bzhugs pa chos zhu
T02D1843:21a-15: bar bya ste / chags par byid pa'i yum ni //
T02D1843:21a-16: rin chen 'byung gnas na chung mchog / ces bya bar sbyar te /
T02D1843:21a-17: der shes rab kyi dbang bskur te de'i dus kyi
T02D1843:21a-18: rgyan gyi khyad par rin po che sna bdun gyis
T02D1843:21a-19: so // de nas rdo rje 'dzin chen por bzhengs nas /
T02D1843:21a-20: de'i yum las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha dgod pa'i
T02D1843:21a-21: 'khor lo'i tshad tsam yang dpag tshad brgya'i khyon tsam
T02D1843:21a-22: du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gong du smos
T02D1843:21a-23: pa nyid do // de'i yum de las mchod pa spro ba ni /
T02D1843:21a-24: bdag po'i phyag rgyar mnyam gzhag pa //
T02D1843:21a-25: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
T02D1843:21a-28: // / da ni rigs so so'i dam tshig bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1843:21a-29: de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1843:21a-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1843:21a-32: nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
T02D1843:21a-33: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni zhe sdang gi rigs kyi dam tshig ste /
T02D1843:21a-34: mi bskyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdo rje rab 'bar bsgoms nas /
T02D1843:21a-35: khro bo'i sbyor bas sems can bsad pa'o //
T02D1843:21a-36: de bzhin du gti mug rigs kyi dam tshig ni nor 'phrog pas 'gro ba'i don byed pa'o //
T02D1843:21a-37: 'od dpag med kyi dam tshig ni sbyor bas 'gro ba'i don byed pa'o //
T02D1843:21a-38: las kyi rigs kyi dam tshig ni brdzun gyi sgo nas 'gro ba'i don byed pa'o //
T02D1843:21a-39: rin po che'i rigs kyi dam tshig ni tshig rtsub mos 'gro ba'i don byed pa'o //
T02D1843:21a-40: de ltar bstan pa'i dam tshig rnams la byang chub
T02D1843:21a-41: sems dpa' rnams ngo mtshar skyes par gyur pa la
T02D1843:21a-42: / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis nam mkha' dang
T02D1843:21b-0: gtsub @21b shing gi dpes chos thams cad rnam par
T02D1843:21b-1: dag pa'i mtshan nyid tsam du bstan to //
T02D1843:21b-2: 'dir bla ma'i man ngag ni rigs gcig gi sku
T02D1843:21b-3: phyag rgyar bsgoms te thabs dang shes rab rol pas
T02D1843:21b-4: dam tshig lnga rdzogs par 'gyur te /
T02D1843:21b-5: de la dang por mkha' byin gyis brlab pa'i gsang
T02D1843:21b-6: sngags h'um phat ces brjod pa ni tshig rtsub mo
T02D1843:21b-8: de nas byang chub sems kyi sa bon gyi 'od
T02D1843:21b-9: zer gyis rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas bkug ste zhal du
T02D1843:21b-10: thim pa ni brdzun te las kyi rigs kyi'o //
T02D1843:21b-11: de nas thabs dang shes rab kyi sbyor ba bskyod
T02D1843:21b-12: pa'i bdag nyid ni mi tshangs par spyod pa ste
T02D1843:21b-14: byang chub kyi sems lces len pa ni rdzas 'phrog pa ste gti mug gi rigs kyi'o //
T02D1843:21b-15: zos nas mi rtog par byed pa ni srog gcod par byed pa ste zhe sdang gi rigs kyi'o //
T02D1843:21b-17: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
T02D1843:21b-18: rdo rje mi bskyod rab bsgoms nas //
T02D1843:21b-19: lag tu rdo rje bsgom par bya //
T02D1843:21b-20: zhes bya ba ni lha'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'o //
T02D1843:21b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni byang chub sems
T02D1843:21b-23: kyi ngo bo bsgoms nas rdo rje phye mar brlag
T02D1843:21b-24: ces bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems zos nas
T02D1843:21b-26: sku gsung thugs kyi longs spyod ni //
T02D1843:21b-27: zhes bya ba ni mi rtog pa'i sku gsung thugs su gyur pa nyid longs spyod du gyur pa'o //
T02D1843:21b-28: de ltar bsgoms pas ji skad smos pa'i yon tan du 'gyur ro //
T02D1843:21b-29: rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig ni bdag rnam
T02D1843:21b-30: par snang mdzad du bsgoms nas thabs dang shes rab
T02D1843:21b-31: kyi sbyor ba las byang chub kyi sems chos rin
T02D1843:21b-32: po che bsgoms te lha'i ting nge 'dzin gyis blangs
T02D1843:21b-34: de nyid sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bor bsgoms nas de'i ngo bor gyur pa ni /
T02D1843:21b-37: 'dod chags kyi dam tshig ni snang ba mtha' yas
T02D1843:21b-38: kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis gzungs dang gnyis su med
T02D1843:21b-39: pa'i rol pas mnyes par bya ba yin te /
T02D1843:21b-41: dam tshig bzhi yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1843:21b-42: zhes bya ba ni yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa ste /
T02D1843:21b-43: 'di ltar 'khyud pa dang sbyor ba dang bskul ba dang bde ba chen po la gnas pa ste /
T02D1843:22a-0: 'di ni bsnyen sgrub bzhi dang yum bzhi dang ldan par @22a * //
T02D1843:22a-2: de yang 'di ltar 'khyud pa ni sku phyag rgya ste sa'i bdag nyid sangs rgyas spyan no //
T02D1843:22a-3: sbyor ba ni ting nge 'dzin te chu'i bdag nyid m'a ma k'i'o //
T02D1843:22a-4: bskul ba ni brtson 'grus te rlung gi bdag nyid sgrol ma'o //
T02D1843:22a-5: bde ba chen po ni shes rab chen po ste me'i bdag nyid gos dkar mo'o //
T02D1843:22a-6: las kyi rigs kyi dam tshig ni bdag nyid rdo
T02D1843:22a-7: rje thogs med du bsgoms la ye shes sems dpa'
T02D1843:22a-8: spyan drangs te zhal du thim pas mi snang bar
T02D1843:22a-9: gyur pa ni / rgyal ba kun gyi gnas rnams dang //
T02D1843:22a-10: rgyal ba thams cad slu bar bya //
T02D1843:22a-11: zhes bya ba yin no dam tshig 'gugs pa zhes bya ba ni dam tshig nyams pa gso ba'o //
T02D1843:22a-12: nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig ni bdag nyid dkon mchog dpal du bsgoms te /
T02D1843:22a-13: gsang gnas byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02D1843:22a-14: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngo mtshar du
T02D1843:22a-15: gyur pa la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin te
T02D1843:22a-17: dam tshig gi rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba ni
T02D1843:22a-18: byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa rnam par sel ba
T02D1843:22a-19: ste las kyi rigs kyi yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1843:22a-20: de la nam mkha'i dpes chos thams cad rang bzhin
T02D1843:22a-21: med par bstan nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni
T02D1843:22a-22: don gyi dbang 'di lta bu mkhyen zhing sems can
T02D1843:22a-23: rnams kyi bsam pa yang mkhyen nas gdod chos 'chad
T02D1843:22a-24: par mdzad do zhes bya ba ni gsang sngags spyi'i
T02D1843:22a-25: dgongs pa ste / de la chos thams cad rang
T02D1843:22a-26: bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir dge ba dang
T02D1843:22a-27: mi dge ba dbyer med de gang ltar bsams pa
T02D1843:22a-29: de'i phyir dug lnga la sogs pa de dag ni dgongs pa yin pas bshad pa yin no //
T02D1843:22a-30: 'on kyang 'di dag la spyad par bya bar gsungs
T02D1843:22a-31: pa ni sems can gyi bsam pa mkhyen pa ste
T02D1843:22a-32: 'di ni thams cad kyi tshul lo //
T02D1843:22a-33: de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig bstan pa ste le'u dgu pa'o /
T02D1843:22a-35: // / da ni lha'i ting nge 'dzin gyi go cha
T02D1843:22a-36: tshang par bsgrub pa las gal te dngos grub ma
T02D1843:22a-37: thob na spogs pa'i cho ga bya ba ston te
T02D1843:22a-38: / 'di'i ting nge 'dzin ni bdag rdo rje 'dzin
T02D1843:22a-39: chen por gnas pa'i lus la sku gsung thugs kyi
T02D1843:22a-40: lha bkod pa'i thugs kar rdo rje dang /
T02D1843:22b-0: phyogs bcu'i 'jig @22b rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i
T02D1843:22b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ka nas h'um aom a'a:sv'a
T02D1843:22b-2: h'a / zhes pa'i yi ge rnam pa lnga gnas
T02D1843:22b-3: par bsams la bdag gi thugs ka'i kyo ba rnams
T02D1843:22b-4: kyis snying bskul bar bsam zhing h'um aom a'a:phat dza:
T02D1843:22b-6: 'di ltar zhag bdun du byas na ji skad bstan pa bzhin 'grub pa'i don to //
T02D1843:22b-7: de la sngags kyi snying po kun bsdus na sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba ste /
T02D1843:22b-8: de'i dngos grub kyi tshul bshad du gsol zhes zhu ba gsol ba las /
T02D1843:22b-9: bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa'i sku gsung thugs
T02D1843:22b-10: la sogs pa bka' stsal to zhes bya ba sbyor
T02D1843:22b-11: ro // rig pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma nas thabs gcig tu bya ba nas /
T02D1843:22b-12: yongs su spyod pa yod pa yang de dag sngags
T02D1843:22b-13: kyi spyod pa la brtson pa rnams la spyan ras
T02D1843:22b-14: kyis mi 'tsho zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin
T02D1843:22b-15: chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1843:22b-16: pa la rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams spyan ras kyis
T02D1843:22b-17: mi 'tsho zhing dngos grub mi stsol te /
T02D1843:22b-19: 'di sngags kyi spyad pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i gtso bo yin te /
T02D1843:22b-20: bdag gis yongs su bskyab pa'i yul ma yin no snyam du dgongs pa yin no //
T02D1843:22b-21: de bas na de dag la phan gdags pa'i phyir 'di bka' stsal to zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D1843:22b-22: gzhan dag na re sngon 'das pa'i dus na de
T02D1843:22b-23: bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsang sngags kyi tshul gyis
T02D1843:22b-24: ngon spyod pa yod kyang de'i tshe shin tu gsang
T02D1843:22b-25: ba'i sgrub pa 'di ma gsungs te /
T02D1843:22b-26: de bas na thabs zab mo 'di lta bus skyes
T02D1843:22b-27: bu dam pa rnams la phan gdags ba'i phyir bstan
T02D1843:22b-28: to // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
T02D1843:22b-29: dang gsung dang thugs kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa
T02D1843:22b-30: zhes bya ba ni sku rdo rje'i sku gsung thugs
T02D1843:22b-31: to // la dmigs pa'o // rdo rje 'dzin pa
T02D1843:22b-32: thams cad kyi bya ba la sogs pa la yang
T02D1843:22b-33: to // la dmigs pa'o // sbyar ro // gsang sngags kyi don ni sngar brjod do //
T02D1843:22b-34: nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa dang //
T02D1843:22b-35: dkyil 'khor bkod pa bsgom par bya //
T02D1843:22b-36: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'o //
T02D1843:22b-37: de yi dbus gnas yi ge h'um //
T02D1843:22b-38: rang gi gzugs su rab tu brtag / ces bya
T02D1843:22b-39: ba ni yi ge h'um las lha'i bdag nyid du
T02D1843:23a-2: rab tu 'phro ba bsam pa ni phyag mtshan du'o //
T02D1843:23a-3: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs ni sku gsung thugs kyi lha'o //
T02D1843:23a-4: snying la zhes bya ba ni ye shes sems dpa'o //
T02D1843:23a-5: yi ge bsgom zhes bya ba ni aom a'a:h'um gsum mo //
T02D1843:23a-6: rang sngags skyes bu bsgoms nas ni //
T02D1843:23a-7: gnas bzhi rnams su gzugs kyi tshul //
T02D1843:23a-8: zhes bya ba ni rigs lnga'i lha zhal gsum gyi bdag nyid du bsgom pa'o //
T02D1843:23a-9: snying ga'i dbus su phra mo zhes bya ba la
T02D1843:23a-10: sogs pa ni gong du bstan pa'i kyo ba'i khyad
T02D1843:23a-11: par rnams so // mdor na dkyil 'khor rgyal ba
T02D1843:23a-12: mchog gi ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa'i dbus su bdag
T02D1843:23a-13: yi ge h'um las lha'i skur bskyed pa'am rang sngags
T02D1843:23a-14: skyes bu gang yang rung bar bsgoms nas /
T02D1843:23a-15: de'i gnas su sku gsung thugs dang ye shes sems
T02D1843:23a-16: dpa' ste bzhir lha bskyed la de'i sbyor bas snying
T02D1843:23a-17: ga'i dbus su pra mo'i rdo rje dang /
T02D1843:23a-19: 'khor lo'i lcags kyu rnams la dbus su h'um a'a:aom
T02D1843:23a-20: rnams gzhag pa ni lha'i bskul bar byed pa dam
T02D1843:23a-21: pa yin no // sngags kyi skyes bu ji snyed pa //
T02D1843:23a-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni spyir btang ba
T02D1843:23a-23: ste sku gsung thugs dang ye shes sems dpa'i sbyor
T02D1843:23a-25: thabs dang shes rab kyi spyod pa dag gis spyad de bsgrub po zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1843:23a-27: dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba yis //
T02D1843:23a-28: zhes pa ni rig ma dbang phyug gzugs brnyan la sbyor ba'o //
T02D1843:23a-29: bud med ji snyed yod pa kun //
T02D1843:23a-30: phyag rgya chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D1843:23a-31: zhes bya ba ste snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1843:23a-32: snying po bskul ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o /
T02D1843:23a-34: // / da ni rig pa'i skyes bu'i le'u bshad de /
T02D1843:23a-35: de la rig pa ni gsang sngags kyi yi ge ste sgo yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1843:23a-36: rig pa las skyes pa'i skyes bu ste lha dang grub pa'o //
T02D1843:23a-37: rdo rje mchog gsum yi ge sngags //
T02D1843:23a-38: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dngos grub kyi
T02D1843:23a-39: thabs bstan te rdo rje mchog gsum ni sku gsung
T02D1843:23a-40: thugs so // yi ge sngags ni aom a'a:h'um ngo //
T02D1843:23a-41: phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa byang chub thob par
T02D1843:23a-42: bya ba'i phyir sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes dbyer
T02D1843:23a-43: med pa'i rdo rje dag gis bsgrub par bya'o zhes
T02D1843:23b-1: / da ni yi ge gsum gyi mtshan nyid bshad de /
T02D1843:23b-2: aom ni ye shes snying po ste //
T02D1843:23b-3: rdo rje sku ni thob byed pa'o //
T02D1843:23b-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1843:23b-5: de la h'um gis sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje
T02D1843:23b-6: grub par bshad pas aom dang a'a: yis kyang sku
T02D1843:23b-7: gsung thugs thob par rigs so //
T02D1843:23b-9: dkyil 'khor rdo rje kun las skyes //
T02D1843:23b-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1843:23b-11: de la dkyil 'khor ni gzhal yas khang ste de
T02D1843:23b-12: sku gsung thugs rdo rje kun las skyes pa ste
T02D1843:23b-13: / de yang rlung gi dkyil 'khor ni aom las so //
T02D1843:23b-14: chu yi dkyil 'khor h'um las so //
T02D1843:23b-15: sa yi dkyil 'khor a'a: las so //
T02D1843:23b-16: de'i steng du yi ge bhr'um las gzhal yas khang du gyur par byas te /
T02D1843:23b-17: de ni nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus chos kyi 'byung
T02D1843:23b-18: gnas su rdo rje sprin sangs rgyas rnams bskyed pa'i
T02D1843:23b-19: gnas der yi ge bhr'um bsam mo zhes so //
T02D1843:23b-20: kha cig na re dkyil 'khor ni gzhal yas khang ngo //
T02D1843:23b-21: rdo rje kun las skyes ni 'og na rdo rje rgya gram la brten pa'o //
T02D1843:23b-22: rdo rje sprin ni kun du rdo rje gtams pa zhes zer ro //
T02D1843:23b-24: rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
T02D1843:23b-25: aom zhes bya ba rab tu bsgom //
T02D1843:23b-26: zhes bya ba rlung rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor yi ge aom gyis mtshan pa'o //
T02D1843:23b-27: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
T02D1843:23b-28: yi ge a'a:ni rnam par bsam //
T02D1843:23b-29: zhes bya ba ni chu'i dkyil 'khor steng na yi ge a'a:yis mtshan pa'o //
T02D1843:23b-30: chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
T02D1843:23b-31: yi ge h'um ni rab tu bsgom //
T02D1843:23b-32: zhes bya ba ni sa gzhi rdo rje'i steng na
T02D1843:23b-33: sna tshogs padma'i 'dab ma la yi ge h'um gis
T02D1843:23b-34: mtshan pa'o // yi ge bhr'um gyis gnas bsgoms te //
T02D1843:23b-35: rdo rje gsum 'byung bsgom par bya //
T02D1843:23b-36: zhes bya ba ni bhr'um gyis gzhal yas khang de
T02D1843:23b-37: yi ge gsum las byung bar bsgom zhes bya ba'i
T02D1843:23b-38: don to // da ni sku gsung thugs kyi yi ges lha bsnyen ba'i thabs su ston te /
T02D1843:23b-40: snying po dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi //
T02D1843:23b-41: zhes bya ba la sogs pas yi ge gsum sku gsung thugs 'grub pa'i rgyur ston to //
T02D1843:23b-42: ye shes rdo rje sprul pas te //
T02D1843:23b-45: de la ye shes rdo rje ni sku gsung thugs so //
T02D1843:24a-2: de'i phyir rgyu las sku gsung thugs kyi 'bras bu 'byung zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
T02D1843:24a-3: da ni gnas bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D1843:24a-4: dben zhing rab tu nyams dga' ba //
T02D1843:24a-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1843:24a-6: de la gnas 'di rnams su gong du bstan pa'i
T02D1843:24a-7: gzhal yas khang tshul bzhin du bskyed nas der sku
T02D1843:24a-8: gsung thugs kyi lha bsgoms nas zla ba phyed kyi
T02D1843:24a-9: 'og nas 'byung ba'i rigs so so'i rig 'dzin rnams
T02D1843:24a-10: su 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1843:24a-11: // de'i tshul ni gnas dang gzhal yas khang de
T02D1843:24a-12: lta bu zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du sa
T02D1843:24a-13: bon gyi yi ge 'bru bcu dgu las rnam par
T02D1843:24a-14: snang mdzad kyis gtso bo byas pa'i dkyil 'khor du
T02D1843:24a-15: skad cig ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bskyed la /
T02D1843:24a-16: de'i snying gar yi ge aom las ye shes lnga'i 'od zer 'phro bar bsams te /
T02D1843:24a-17: bsgoms na rnam par snang mdzad kyi rig 'dzin du 'gyur te /
T02D1843:24a-18: tshe bskal pa gsum du gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02D1843:24a-19: tshul 'di ni rigs gzhan la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1843:24a-20: rdo rje kun dang rgyal ba'i gnas //
T02D1843:24a-21: ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya //
T02D1843:24a-22: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje kun ni sku gsung thugs kyi lha'o //
T02D1843:24a-23: rgyal ba'i gnas ni dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1843:24a-24: de ni ye shes rdo rje yi ge gsum gyis bya'o //
T02D1843:24a-25: ye shes dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
T02D1843:24a-26: rdo rje chen po bsam par bya //
T02D1843:24a-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni byang chub sems
T02D1843:24a-28: dpa' rnams bsgrub pa ste 'di'i bsgom pa'i tshul ni
T02D1843:24a-30: 'di ni nam mkha'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis mi snang ba bsgrub pa'o //
T02D1843:24a-31: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
T02D1843:24a-32: zhes bya ba ni ma las 'jam dpal bskyed pa'o //
T02D1843:24a-34: zhes pa ni sa'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis mngon shes bsgrub pa'o //
T02D1843:24a-35: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni //
T02D1843:24a-36: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam //
T02D1843:24a-37: rdo rje sems dpa' rab bsgoms la //
T02D1843:24a-38: yi ge aom ni bsgom par bya //
T02D1843:24a-39: zhes bya ba ni aom gyis thugs kyi rdo rje bsgrub pa ste /
T02D1843:24a-40: 'di ltar yi ge aom sku gsung thugs yon tan
T02D1843:24a-41: phrin las lnga bsgrub par ston pa ni byang chub
T02D1843:24a-42: sems dpa' lnga bsgom pa yin te sku ni byams
T02D1843:24a-43: pa'o // gsung ni 'jig rten dbang phyug go //
T02D1843:24b-0: thugs na kun du bzang @24b po'o ;
T02D1843:24b-1: / yon tan phyag na rdo rje'o //
T02D1843:24b-2: phrin las ni 'jam dpal te 'di dag gi sgo nas bsgrub par bstan to //
T02D1843:24b-3: la la na re aom gcig pus rigs lnga'i mngon shes bsgrub pa yin te /
T02D1843:24b-4: bdag nyid lha'i skur bsgoms la yi ge aom ye
T02D1843:24b-5: shes lnga'i rang bzhin can snying gar bzhag ste dbang
T02D1843:24b-6: po lnga la rdo rje bsgoms na mngon shes 'thob
T02D1843:24b-7: po // gzhan rnams su yang de bzhin du sbyar
T02D1843:24b-8: te dbang po lnga ni rang rang gi mtshan ma
T02D1843:24b-9: po // bsgom par bya'o // shin tu dben pa'i ri dgon dang //
T02D1843:24b-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnas bstan to //
T02D1843:24b-11: rnam pa gcig tu 'di dag ni brda yin te /
T02D1843:24b-12: rigs kyi yum bzhis bsgrub pa'i dus su ldan par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1843:24b-13: mi bskyod ye shes dag la sogs //
T02D1843:24b-14: zhes bya ba ni gong du bstan pa'i mjug sdud do //
T02D1843:24b-15: rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa //
T02D1843:24b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'di nyid kyis mngon shes bsgrub pa'o //
T02D1843:24b-17: kha cig ni gong ma 'di bang po la dgod pa nyid du 'dod do //
T02D1843:24b-18: rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil nyid du //
T02D1843:24b-19: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa bstan te /
T02D1843:24b-20: de ni 'di ltar rdzas las 'khor lo byas te
T02D1843:24b-21: mdun du bzhag nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi sbyor
T02D1843:24b-22: bas dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te 'khor lo la bstim
T02D1843:24b-23: pa'i sbyor ba byas pas 'bar bar gyur pa de'i
T02D1843:24b-24: tshe lag tu blangs na sku rdo rje dang 'dra
T02D1843:24b-25: bar 'gyur ro // sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
T02D1843:24b-26: zhes pa ni gnas kyi gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin dang
T02D1843:24b-27: dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin du
T02D1843:24b-28: ldan pa'o // bdag gi lus la snang mdzad bzhag pa bsgom pa'o //
T02D1843:24b-29: snying gar yi ge aom bsams la //
T02D1843:24b-30: sngags kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom //
T02D1843:24b-31: zhes bya ba ni aom rang bzhin gyis dengs par gyur te /
T02D1843:24b-32: mi dmigs pa ni sngags kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
T02D1843:24b-33: de la sems mi g-yeng ba ni mgon po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba de ni rdo rje sems dpa'o//
T02D1843:24b-34: nam zhig ting nge 'dzin de brtan par gyur na
T02D1843:24b-35: ji skad smos pa bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes bya
T02D1843:24b-36: ba'i don to // 'dir man ngag ni gong du
T02D1843:24b-37: bstan pa'i sngags kyi rnam pa bsgom pa yang dkyil
T02D1843:24b-39: bdag ye shes sems dpa' la /
T02D1843:25a-1: le zla ba lta bu la dmigs pa ni sems sbyang ba'i man ngag go //
T02D1843:25a-2: de bzhin du mi bskyod pa dang /
T02D1843:25a-3: tshe dpag med kyi thig le bsgom pa yang sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1843:25a-4: rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil gnas par //
T02D1843:25a-5: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
T02D1843:25a-6: lus ngag sems la yi ge aom //
T02D1843:25a-7: bsams na de ni bskal par gnas //
T02D1843:25a-8: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin du byas te /
T02D1843:25a-9: sku gsung thugs kyi gnas su yi ge aom bsgoms
T02D1843:25a-10: nas nam zhig brtan par gyur pa na tshe la
T02D1843:25a-11: dbang byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1843:25a-12: // gzhan la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1843:25a-13: rig pa skyes pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o /
T02D1843:25a-15: // / da ni bsnyen sgrub rnam pa bzhi dang /
T02D1843:25a-16: las phran tshegs rnams ston to //
T02D1843:25a-17: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1843:25a-18: de la rol mo 'di dag ces bya ba ni
T02D1843:25a-19: stong pa nyid las sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul du snang
T02D1843:25a-20: ba'o // dgon pa chen po la sogs pa ni gnas bstan to //
T02D1843:25a-22: lus dang ngag sems rdo rje las //
T02D1843:25a-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'jam dpal bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan te /
T02D1843:25a-24: 'di'i sgrub pa ni sgrub thabs dag las shes par bya'o //
T02D1843:25a-25: da ni bdud rtsi ri lu bsgrub pa bstan par bya'o //
T02D1843:25a-27: rdo rje mi phyed gsum las byung /
T02D1843:25a-28: zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi lnga'o //
T02D1843:25a-29: lcags gsum las byung zhes bya ba ni zangs lcags
T02D1843:25a-30: gser las byas pa'i sran ma tsam gyi nang du
T02D1843:25a-31: bdud rtsi ril lu bcug ste /
T02D1843:25a-32: lha'i sbyor bas khar bcug ste /
T02D1843:25a-33: der sangs rgyas rnams bkug ste bsgoms nas rtags lnga
T02D1843:25a-34: skyes pa na zos nas nam mkha' la 'gro ba
T02D1843:25a-35: dang / 'od zer 'bar ba dang mi snang ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1843:25a-36: rnam pa gcig tu rang gi shes rab ma'i bha ga la bzhag ste /
T02D1843:25a-37: mtshan ma thob nas lces blangs na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1843:25a-39: zhes bya ba ni rdzas bya sgrub pa bstan pa ste /
T02D1843:25a-40: rnam par snang mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis mdun
T02D1843:25a-41: du bhrum las 'khor lo 'bar ba bsam la kye
T02D1843:25a-42: ba'i sbyor bas sangs rgyas rnam bkug ste stims pas
T02D1843:25a-43: mtshan ma thob pa na lag tu blangs na ji
T02D1843:25a-44: skad smos pa'i yon tan du 'gyur ro //
T02D1843:25a-45: rdo rje la sogs pa 'di dag kyang de bzhin du sbyar te /
T02D1843:25b-0: rang rang gi @25b lha'i sbyor bas h'um la sogs
T02D1843:25b-1: pa'i yi ge rnams kyis rdo rje la sogs pa'i
T02D1843:25b-3: de yang gzhal yas khang du bsgoms la /
T02D1843:25b-4: rang gi snying ga'i ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon
T02D1843:25b-5: las lha mo rdo rje kyo ba can rnams 'phros
T02D1843:25b-6: te / de dag gis rang gi rigs kyi gtso
T02D1843:25b-7: bo byas pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa rnams drangs
T02D1843:25b-8: te mtshan ma'i nang du zhugs par bsgoms te de
T02D1843:25b-9: 'bar ba dang so so'i rigs kyi yum gyi snying
T02D1843:25b-10: po bzlas shing lag tu blangs na 'grub par 'gyur
T02D1843:25b-11: te / ro // ye shes lnga ldan bstan na ni //
T02D1843:25b-12: zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma de dag la ye shes kyi 'od zer dang ldan par bsgom pa'o //
T02D1843:25b-13: aom ni ri lu tsa na ka'i //
T02D1843:25b-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngon du bstan pa'i ri lu'i tshad do //
T02D1843:25b-15: mkha' dbyings nam mkha'i dkyil gnas par //
T02D1843:25b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gong du bstan
T02D1843:25b-17: pa'i 'khor lo la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams la
T02D1843:25b-18: sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul
T02D1843:25b-19: bstan gong ma las khyad par du rlung gi dkyil
T02D1843:25b-20: 'khor med do zhes zer shes kyi snang ba thob
T02D1843:25b-21: pas bya'o // tri sh'ul khyo ba gtang la sogs //
T02D1843:25b-22: zhes bya ba ni de dag tu ma zad kyi
T02D1843:25b-23: mtshan ma 'di dag la yang bsgrub po zhes bya
T02D1843:25b-24: ba'i don to // lam gyi bzhi mdo shing gcig drung //
T02D1843:25b-25: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dgug pa'i khyad par bstan te /
T02D1843:25b-27: sbyor gsum rdo rje can rnams kyis /
T02D1843:25b-28: sbyor gsum sngags kyi skyes bu bsam //
T02D1843:25b-29: zhes bya ba ni sku gsung thugs kyi lhar bsam pa'o //
T02D1843:25b-30: sangs rgyas ye shes blo can gyis //
T02D1843:25b-31: sku gsung thugs kyi kyo ba dang //
T02D1843:25b-32: zhes bya ba ni thugs ka'i yi ge las rdo rje la sogs pa'i kyo ba spro pa'o //
T02D1843:25b-33: rang gi dkyil 'khor mchog gnas pa //
T02D1843:25b-34: zhes bya ba ni dgug par bya ba'i don to //
T02D1843:25b-36: dam tshig las byung phyogs bcu pa //
T02D1843:25b-38: dam tshig sku gsung thugs las byung ba'i phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams so ;
T02D1843:25b-39: / rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo'i mchog / ces
T02D1843:25b-40: bya ba la sogs pas ni gong ma'i khyad par
T02D1843:25b-41: bstan to // kha cig na re 'di ni gong
T02D1843:25b-42: ma las khyad par du rlung gi dkyil 'khor med
T02D1843:25b-44: rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i //
T02D1843:26a-0: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni @26a * //
T02D1843:26a-1: bdag sangs rgyas kyi skur bsgoms te /
T02D1843:26a-2: de'i lag tu kyo ba bsgoms la dgug pa'o //
T02D1843:26a-4: thugs ka nas spros pa'i lha mo'i lag na /
T02D1843:26a-5: sku gsung thugs kyi kyo ba thogs par bsgoms pas dgug ce'o //
T02D1843:26a-6: rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i //
T02D1843:26a-7: rdo rje sku rnams rab bsgoms la //
T02D1843:26a-8: rdo rje sbyor bas lce bsgoms na //
T02D1843:26a-9: zhes bya ba ni lce rdo rjer bsgom pa'o //
T02D1843:26a-10: da ni sha rnam pa lnga bza' ba'i khyad par bstan te /
T02D1843:26a-12: sha chen dam tshig mchog gis ni //
T02D1843:26a-13: rdo rje gsum mchog bsgrub par bya //
T02D1843:26a-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni sha rnam pa
T02D1843:26a-15: lnga'i yon tan bstan te chos nyid kyi mthu yin
T02D1843:26a-16: no // rnam gcig tu smos pa'i dngos grub rnams
T02D1843:26a-17: bsgrub pa'i dus su sha 'di rnams bza' ba ste
T02D1843:26a-18: no // / de la sha chen ni sku gsung
T02D1843:26a-19: thugs kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i dus su bza' bar
T02D1843:26a-20: no // / bya'o / gzhan la yang de bzhin du sbyar ro //
T02D1843:26a-21: rdo rje can gyi sku gsung thugs ;
T02D1843:26a-22: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dngos grub
T02D1843:26a-23: bsgrub pa'am bdud rtsi za ba'i ting nge 'dzin te
T02D1843:26a-24: / sku gsung thugs kyi lha dang /
T02D1843:26a-26: dbu rgyan gyi lha dang ldan par bsgom pa'o //
T02D1843:26a-27: lce yi rdo rje dam tshig la //
T02D1843:26a-28: rdo rje can gyis h'um bsgoms te //
T02D1843:26a-29: zhes bya ba ni gong gi sha dang bdud rtsi za ba'i ting nge 'dzin te /
T02D1843:26a-30: 'di'i don ni bdag gong ma ltar bsgoms pa'i lte ba ru padma'i steng du aom //
T02D1843:26a-31: snying gar padma'i steng du a'a: / mgrin pa'i padma'i 'dab ma gcig lce yin te /
T02D1843:26a-32: de'i steng du h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga par gyur pa'i rtse mo la h'um bsams te /
T02D1843:26a-33: de ltar sku gsung thugs kyi gnas byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D1843:26a-34: bdud rtsi lnga byin gyis brlabs te bza' bar bya'o //
T02D1843:26a-35: 'di man chad ni gong ma ltar bsgrubs shing bdud
T02D1843:26a-36: rtsir byin gyis brlabs pa'i sha rnam pa lnga la
T02D1843:26a-37: sogs pa zos pa'i yon tan bstan to //
T02D1843:26a-38: bsnyen pa'i dam tshig sbyor ba dang //
T02D1843:26a-39: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi bstan te /
T02D1843:26a-41: rdo rje bye brag shes byas la //
T02D1843:26a-42: de nas las rnams bsgrub par bya //
T02D1843:26a-43: zhes bya ba ni bsnyen sgrub kyi thabs kyi bye brag shes par bya ste /
T02D1843:26a-44: sgrub pa chen po'i mthar las rnam pa bzhi brtsam pa'o //
T02D1843:26b-0: kha cig na re rdo rje bye brag che 'bring gi bye brag yin no @26b zhe'o //
T02D1843:26b-2: bsnyen pa'i ting 'dzin rab sbyor bas //
T02D1843:26b-3: byang chub mchog tu bsgom par bya //
T02D1843:26b-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1843:26b-5: bsnyen pa ni byang chub kyi sems las lhar bskyad pa'o //
T02D1843:26b-6: nye bar sgrub pa grub mchog la //
T02D1843:26b-7: rdo rje'i skye mched rnam par dpyad //
T02D1843:26b-8: ces bya ba ni khams dang skye mched byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02D1843:26b-9: sngags kyi bdag po bsgoms pa yi //
T02D1843:26b-10: bsgrub pa'i tshe na bskul bar gsungs //
T02D1843:26b-11: zhes bya ba ni sku gsung thugs kyi gnas rnams nas rang gi sprul pa spros te /
T02D1843:26b-12: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams spyan drangs nas mdun gyi
T02D1843:26b-13: nam mkha' la bzhugs pa la ji skad smos pa'i
T02D1843:26b-14: gsol ba gdab pa'i tshig gis bskul ba'o //
T02D1843:26b-15: sgrub pa chen po byed pa'i tshe //

T02D1843:26b-17: dbu rgyan la ni bdag po bsam //
T02D1843:26b-18: zhes bya ba ni ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon
T02D1843:26b-19: gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis
T02D1843:26b-20: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i bum pas dbang bskur bas
T02D1843:26b-21: rigs kyi bdag po de dbu rgyan du gyur pa'o
T02D1843:26b-22: // bsnyen pa'i ye shes bdud rtsi dag / thams cad du ni brtag par bya //
T02D1843:26b-23: zhes bya ba ni ye shes bdud rtsi'i bsnyen pa
T02D1843:26b-24: ni spyir brtag go zhes bya ba 'di ni mchog
T02D1843:26b-25: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba'i yan lag drug
T02D1843:26b-26: dang ldan par bsgom pa'i sgo nas mchog gi dngos
T02D1843:26b-27: grub bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1843:26b-28: thams cad du brtag pa zhes bya ba'i tshig ni sgrub pa kun la ldan pa'o //
T02D1843:26b-29: dben pa chen po la sogs pa ni las kyi spyir shes par bya'o //
T02D1843:26b-30: yang na rdo rje bzhi dag gi //
T02D1843:26b-31: brtul zhugs brtan pas bsnyen pa bya ;
T02D1843:26b-32: / sku gsum mnyam pa nyid gyur pa //
T02D1843:26b-33: bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D1843:26b-34: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas thun mong gi dngos grub bsgrub pa ste /
T02D1843:26b-35: de la rdo rje bzhi ni 'di skad du //
T02D1843:26b-36: dang po stong pa'i byang chub sems //
T02D1843:26b-37: gnyis pa sa bon 'byung ba dang //
T02D1843:26b-38: gsum pa la ni gzugs rdzogs te //
T02D1843:26b-39: bzhi pa la ni yi ge dgod //
T02D1843:26b-40: rdo rje rnam bzhi 'di dag ni //
T02D1843:26b-41: bsnyen pa thun mong sgrub pa'o //
T02D1843:26b-43: de la yi ge dgod pa ni le'u bcu gcig pa nas 'byung ba lta bur shes par bya'o //
T02D1843:26b-44: 'di ni bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi'i sbyor ba mi dgos kyi /
T02D1843:27a-1: lag bzhi'i sbyor ba tshang ba ni mchog gi dngos grub la dgos pa yin te /
T02D1843:27a-3: bsnyen pa'i yan lag drug tshul du //
T02D1843:27a-4: byas pas grub pa mchog yin te //
T02D1843:27a-5: gzhan dag tu ni bsgrubs gyur na //
T02D1843:27a-6: dngos grub mchog tu mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1843:27a-8: gzhan zhes bya ba ni skabs kyi shugs kyis rdo rje bzhi la bya ba yin no //
T02D1843:27a-9: de ltar bsnyen sgrub bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting
T02D1843:27a-10: nge 'dzin gyis ni mchog gi dngos grub sgrub pa
T02D1843:27a-11: yin la / rdo rje rnam bzhi yis ni thun

T02D1843:27a-15: sbyor byed dag / bsnyen pa'i cho ga dang yang

T02D1843:27a-19: rdo rje bzhi yis sgrub byed pa //

T02D1843:27a-25: rdo rje rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas ni thun mong

T02D1843:27a-27: ltar lha mang bo'i don du 'dod do //
T02D1843:27a-28: mchog gi ye shes bdud rtsi zhes bya ba yang lha gtso bo la bya bar 'dod do ;
T02D1843:27a-29: /'di ltar sbyar ba'i rten du gyur pa'i yum ni bdag gis ma mthong ngo //

T02D1843:27a-33: // rgyud gzhan dag las ni rdo rje rnam pa

T02D1843:27a-40: nye bar sgrub pa nyid sku phyag rgya'i ngo bos so //
T02D1843:27a-41: sgrub pa'i sdom pa ni gsung ste /

T02D1843:27a-43: sgrub pa chen po'i sdom pa'i yul thugs rdo rje
T02D1843:27a-44: ste byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po'i rang
T02D1843:27b-0: 'di rnams kyang skabs 'dir sku @27b gsung thugs su
T02D1843:27b-1: byin gyis brlab pa bskul ba'i bdag nyid du bstan

T02D1843:27b-3: med pa'i sdom pa bsgoms pas byang chub kyi sems
T02D1843:27b-4: bde ba chen po shes par gyur par byas nas

T02D1843:27b-7: kyang zla ba gcig la sogs pas 'grub par 'gyur
T02D1843:27b-8: ro // byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po'i

T02D1843:27b-23: por gyur pas mo'i sgrar bshad do //

T02D1843:27b-29: ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab

T02D1843:27b-31: sngags kyi don kun bzlas pa ni //

T02D1843:27b-33: rdo rje dbye ba gsum gyi mthar //
T02D1843:27b-34: bkod pa rdo rje gsum zhes bya //
T02D1843:27b-36: rdo rje mi phyed gsum ni sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid kyi lha'o //
T02D1843:27b-37: de'i mtshan ma ni rdo rje dbye ba gsum yin te /

T02D1843:27b-43: de'i mthar dgod pa rdo rje gsum zhes bya ba
T02D1843:27b-44: ni sku gsung thugs kyi lha rnams kyi thugs kar
T02D1843:27b-45: rang rang gi mtshan ma'i lte ba la rang rang
T02D1843:27b-47: sku gsung thugs kyi gnas rnams nas //
T02D1843:27b-48: spro ba rnam pa gsum dag bya //
T02D1843:28a-0: zhes bya ba ni gnas de rnams @28a * //
T02D1843:28a-1: nas rang dang 'dra ba'i lha spro ba'o //
T02D1843:28a-2: kha cig ni rang dang 'dra ba'i lha mo spro zhes zer ro //
T02D1843:28a-4: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs //
T02D1843:28a-5: bsgoms nas zhes bya ba ni mdun gyi nam mkha' la sku gsung thugs kyi lha rnams bsgom pa'o //
T02D1843:28a-6: mchod pa'i mchog brtag pa zhes bya ba ni gnas gsum nas lha mo sprul te mchod pa'o //
T02D1843:28a-7: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs //
T02D1843:28a-8: bsams nas zhes bya ba yang sngar bzhin te /
T02D1843:28a-9: ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis bya ba ste 'di ni bzlas pa'i yul yin no //
T02D1843:28a-10: yang na dbye ba rnam gsum gyis //
T02D1843:28a-11: so so dag tu spro bar bya //
T02D1843:28a-12: zhes bya ba ni rim gyis spro ba'i don te /
T02D1843:28a-13: dang por thugs ka nas spros te /
T02D1843:28a-14: de yang sku rdo rje'i sbyor bas spros la //
T02D1843:28a-15: de nas gsung dang thugs dag la yang rim gyis spro ba'o //
T02D1843:28a-16: lus dang ngag sems bdag med par //
T02D1843:28a-17: shes pa'i sems kyis rab tu spro //
T02D1843:28a-18: zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa'i shes rab dang ldan pas spro bar bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1843:28a-19: brjod nas rdo rje spro ba ni //
T02D1843:28a-20: rdzogs nas rab tu bsdu bar bya //
T02D1843:28a-21: zhes bya ba ni dam bcas pa rdzogs nas bsdu ba'o //
T02D1843:28a-23: sku dang gsung dang thugs byang chub pa'i //
T02D1843:28a-24: dngos dang dngos med rnam dpyad pa //
T02D1843:28a-25: sangs rgyas sku zhes bya bar bshad //
T02D1843:28a-27: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs dngos po'am
T02D1843:28a-28: dngos po med pa'i mtha' gang du'ang ma grub ste

T02D1843:28a-31: ji ltar gsal ba gsang ba'i tshig /
T02D1843:28a-32: skad gdangs min pa rdo rje'i tshig / ces pa'o //
T02D1843:28a-33: thugs kyi bzlas pa ni mi gnas pa'i rdzogs pa'i
T02D1843:28a-34: byang chub kyi sems gnas pa'i bdag nyid rnam par
T02D1843:28a-35: dag par dpyad cing bsgom pa ste 'di ni sems
T02D1843:28a-36: kyi bzlas pa'o // rin po che'i bzlas pa ni

T02D1843:28a-38: las 'das pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i don rtogs
T02D1843:28a-39: kyi bzlas pa'o // pa'o // rdo rje thogs med

T02D1843:28a-41: du sangs rgyas kyi sku'i 'od zer 'phro zhing don
T02D1843:28a-42: kyi bzlas pa'o // pa'o // mdzad pa dang /
T02D1843:28a-43: slar bdag gi sku gsung thugs kyi gnas su 'du
T02D1843:28b-0: de rnams kyang sku gsung thugs kyi bzlas @28b par 'du ba'i phyir rdo rje'i bzlas pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1843:28b-2: bdag nyid rigs kyi bdag po'am /
T02D1843:28b-3: khro bo nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te
T02D1843:28b-4: khro bo'i gsang sngags kyi sgra yi ge h'um dang
T02D1843:28b-5: bcas pa 'brug gi sgra ltar zab pa bzlas pa'o
T02D1843:28b-6: // gti mug gi bzlas pa ni 'dod pa'i yul
T02D1843:28b-7: gyis myas par gyur pa'i gti mug can rnams sku
T02D1843:28b-8: rdo rje'i sgo nas bskyab cing phan par sems pa'i
T02D1843:28b-9: ting nge 'dzin gyis sems can ji snyed pa sku'i
T02D1843:28b-10: rdo rjer gzhag pa ni gti mug gi bzlas pa

T02D1843:28b-13: bskyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis gsung dang thugs kyi
T02D1843:28b-14: rdo rje la bzhag cing bkod pa ni 'dod chags
T02D1843:28b-15: dang zhe sdang gi bzlas pa'o //

T02D1843:28b-17: mtshan ma mtha' dag las 'das pa ni ci yang ma yin pa'i phyir ma ning zhes bya ste /
T02D1843:28b-18: 'dir bla ma'i man ngag ni sku gsung thugs rdo
T02D1843:28b-19: rje bsgoms pa'i snying ga'i padma la yi ge a'a:bsams

T02D1843:28b-22: sems can kun gyi srog yin te /

T02D1843:28b-25: nyid du gsal bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni

T02D1843:28b-27: go // 'dod chags yang dag don bsgom pa /
T02D1843:28b-28: rdo rje'i bdag po thams cad ni //

T02D1843:29a-4: zhe sdang gis 'dul ba'i chos can la gsod pas

T02D1843:29a-35: zhes bya ba'i tshig gis sku gsung thugs kyi spros pa dang //
T02D1843:29a-37: lus kyis sku yi ngo bo nyid //

T02D1843:30a-11: 'dzin bsnyen sgrub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs pas
T02D1843:30a-12: ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi mthar zhe sdang rdo rje'i
T02D1843:30a-13: ting nge 'dzin gyis bskyed la mdun du bsgrub bya'i
T02D1843:30a-14: ling+ga bzhag ste / der thugs ka'i rdo rje kyo bas sems can thams cad bkug ste /
T02D1843:30a-15: sku gsung thugs kyi lhar bsgoms la de dag gi lus kyi lha gsum la bsdus te /
T02D1843:30a-16: de nas bdag gi ba spu'i bu ga nas khro bo'i tshogs mang po spros te /
T02D1843:30a-17: ling+ga bsgrub byar dmigs pa'i sha khrag za ba dang /
T02D1843:30a-18: rgyu ma 'dren pa la sogs par bsgom pa'o //
T02D1843:30a-20: nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus dag tu //
T02D1843:30a-21: 'khor lo rtse lnga kha bzhi la //
T02D1843:30a-22: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhe sdang
T02D1843:30a-23: rdo rjer bsgoms pa'i lag pa g-yas par rdo rje
T02D1843:30a-24: rtse lnga pa kha gdengs pa bsam pa yin no
T02D1843:30a-25: // kha cig na re rdo rje rtse lnga pa
T02D1843:30a-26: rgya gram du gyur pa la 'khor lo 'bar ba'i
T02D1843:30a-27: mu khyud kyis bskor ba yin te /
T02D1843:30a-28: 'di ni rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bya'o zhes zer ro //
T02D1843:30a-31: / zhes pa'ang 'khor lo las rdo rje'i 'bar ba 'phos pas mtshan pa'o zhes 'chad do //
T02D1843:30a-32: bka'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to
T02D1843:30a-33: zhes bya ba ni 'di las grub par byed pa'i
T02D1843:30a-34: bka' yin te nges par byed pa'i tha tshig go
T02D1843:30a-35: // nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus su ni //
T02D1843:30a-37: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma
T02D1843:30a-38: bzhin du bsgoms pa las phyag mtshan 'khor lo rdo
T02D1843:30a-39: rjes brgyan pa rnam par bsgoms te /
T02D1843:30a-40: bdag gi sprul pa rnams la 'di skad du bka' bsgo ste /
T02D1843:30a-41: sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba can //
T02D1843:30a-42: sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la gson //
T02D1843:30b-0: zhes bya ba @30b la sogs pa'i tshig gi bskul ba'o //
T02D1843:30b-1: bka'i 'khor lo 'di ni dgra bsad pa dang /
T02D1843:30b-3: lha gnad la dbab pa dag la sbyar ro //
T02D1843:30b-4: de la dgra bsad pa'i dus su ni gong du smos pa'i tshul 'di nyid do //
T02D1843:30b-5: bgegs bskrad pa'i sbyor ba la ni zhes sdang rdo
T02D1843:30b-6: rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyis khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du
T02D1843:30b-7: spros te / bgegs rnams la 'di skad du bsgo te /
T02D1843:30b-8: sku gsung thugs su bdag sbyor bas /
T02D1843:30b-9: bgegs rnams thams cad nga la nyon //
T02D1843:30b-10: zhes bya bar sbyar te bka' bsgo'o //
T02D1843:30b-11: lha gnad la dbab pa'i sbyor ba la ni zhe
T02D1843:30b-12: sdang rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rang gi rigs
T02D1843:30b-13: kyi sprul pa spros te bka' dkyus ji lta ba
T02D1843:30b-14: bzhin du bsgo'o // sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo can //
T02D1843:30b-15: nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam //
T02D1843:30b-16: gshin rje gshed kyi 'khor lo che //
T02D1843:30b-17: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gshin rje gshed kyi bka'i 'khor lo yin te /
T02D1843:30b-18: 'di ni gshin rje gshed kyi khro bo rnams kyis
T02D1843:30b-19: gtso bo byas par zad kyi gzhan ni snga ma
T02D1843:30b-20: nyid dang 'dra'o // sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'am //
T02D1843:30b-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gzhan gyi bka'i 'khor lo bstan pa ste /
T02D1843:30b-22: 'di ltar 'khor lo'i gtso bo sku gsung thugs kyi lhas byas pa'am /
T02D1843:30b-23: rang sngags don gyis yon tan yi dam gyi lhas byas pa'am /
T02D1843:30b-24: yang na khro bo gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur bas gtso bo byas te /
T02D1843:30b-25: sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor bsrung ba la sogs pa'i bka'i 'khor lo bsgom mo //
T02D1843:30b-26: nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus dag tu /
T02D1843:30b-27: chos kyi snang mdzad sku mchog las //
T02D1843:30b-28: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bsrung ba'i ting
T02D1843:30b-29: nge 'dzin te zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1843:30b-30: du sbyar ro // rgya mtsho rkang pas gnon pa
T02D1843:30b-31: ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis chu
T02D1843:30b-32: la m'a ma k'i thim par bsgom ste /
T02D1843:30b-33: nam sra bar gyur pa ni de'i spyi bo'i steng du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1843:30b-34: mu stegs dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad gnon
T02D1843:30b-35: pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bdag nyid khro bor bsgoms
T02D1843:30b-36: pa'i thugs ka nas kyo ba spros pas mu stegs
T02D1843:30b-37: can la sogs pa bkug ste /
T02D1843:30b-38: dbang chen 'og tu mnan nas de'i steng las kyi rdo rje rgya gram gyis mnan te /
T02D1843:30b-39: de'i steng du bdag khro bor bsgoms pa'i lag pa
T02D1843:30b-40: g-yas rdo rje thogs pas mnan na rgol ba gnon
T02D1843:31a-0: par 'gyur ro // kha cig na re dbang chen rlung gi steng du bsgrub @31a * //
T02D1843:31a-2: de'i spyi bor las kyi rdo rjes mtshon pa'i rkang pas mnan zhe'o //
T02D1843:31a-3: dpung gnon pa ni rdo rje gsung mchog sku gsung thugs kyi khro bo bsgom ste /
T02D1843:31a-4: de yang gser gyi ri rab lta bu shin tu
T02D1843:31a-5: ljid che bas mnan par bsgoms na sangs rgyas kyi
T02D1843:31a-6: dpung yang gnon na mi'i dbang po'i dpung dag lta
T02D1843:31a-7: ci smos zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1843:31a-8: dgra rmongs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni h'um las rdo
T02D1843:31a-9: rje phur bu stod rtse lnga pa smad dpal rtser
T02D1843:31a-10: gnas pa rdo rje rtse lnga'i phyag rgyas blangs te
T02D1843:31a-11: / snying gar btab na dgra rmongs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1843:31a-12: nad spong ba zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni grong
T02D1843:31a-13: ngam grong khyer gyi nam mkha' la bdag gi thugs
T02D1843:31a-14: ka nas rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnas par bsams
T02D1843:31a-15: te / de las bskal pa'i me 'bar bas nad
T02D1843:31a-16: rnams thams cad bsregs te slar rdo rje la bsdu
T02D1843:31a-17: te / bar bya'o // de nas rdo rje las
T02D1843:31a-18: lha mo bdud rtsi rin po che'i bum pa gang
T02D1843:31a-19: ba 'dzin pa spros pas nad pa la blugs par
T02D1843:31a-20: bsams na nad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1843:31a-21: yi dam bcas pa rdzogs nas kyang //
T02D1843:31a-22: sngags kyi gnas su spyad par bya //
T02D1843:31a-23: zhes bya ba ni las 'di dag gang byed kyang bsnyen pa rdzogs nas bya bar ston pa'o //
T02D1843:31a-25: las byas zin nas rang gi yid dam rgyun du bya ba yin no zhes zer ro //
T02D1843:31a-26: skye 'gro 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rdo rje
T02D1843:31a-27: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rang bzhin gyi phur bus phyogs
T02D1843:31a-29: lha dang bgegs la sogs pa thams cad zhi bar
T02D1843:31a-30: 'gyur ro zhes bya ste 'di ni bka'i 'khor lo
T02D1843:31a-31: dang sbyar te bgegs bsrung bar bya ba'o //
T02D1843:31a-32: mdangs bzang dkyil 'khor dam pa ni //
T02D1843:31a-33: nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus su bsam //
T02D1843:31a-34: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gong du bstan
T02D1843:31a-35: pa'i lam rnam pa bzhi'i thabs bstan pa yin te
T02D1843:31a-37: mdangs bzang dkyil 'khor dam pa ni //
T02D1843:31a-38: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor chen po bsgom pa yin te /
T02D1843:31a-39: de nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus chos kyi 'byung gnas su bsams la ;
T02D1843:31a-40: bdag rnam par snang mdzad du bsgoms pa'i zugs kar 'dod pa'i bsgrub bya bzhag ste /
T02D1843:31a-41: rang gi ba spu'i bu gnas sangs rgyas spyan dang
T02D1843:31a-42: ldan pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi nam mkha'i khams
T02D1843:31a-44: phyogs bcu'i ye shes bdud rtsi bsdus nas bum pa
T02D1843:31b-0: bdud rtsis bkang ba rnams @31b kyis snying ga'i 'dod
T02D1843:31b-2: dbang bskur bar bsams na zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1843:31b-4: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
T02D1843:31b-5: dbang chen dkyil 'khor bsam par bya //
T02D1843:31b-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
T02D1843:31b-7: de la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su dbang chen gser gyi 'khor lo bsams te /
T02D1843:31b-8: de'i steng du chos 'dzin snang ba mtha' yas bsams nas /
T02D1843:31b-9: de'i snying gar rgyas par 'dod pa bzhag ste /
T02D1843:31b-10: bdag gi ba spu'i bu ga nas gos dkar mo
T02D1843:31b-11: la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams spros pas phyogs bcu'i
T02D1843:31b-12: chos rin po che'i bdud rtsi bsdus te /
T02D1843:31b-13: snying ga'i 'dod pa la phab cing dbang bskur bas
T02D1843:31b-14: chos rin po che rgyas par bsgoms na rgyas par
T02D1843:31b-16: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni //
T02D1843:31b-17: rdo rje dkyil 'khor zla gam bsam //
T02D1843:31b-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1843:31b-19: dkyil 'khor zla gam gyi dbus su rdo rje chos sam rdo rje don grub bsgoms te /
T02D1843:31b-20: de'i snying gar dbang dang mthu stobs ldan par 'dod pa bzhag nas /
T02D1843:31b-21: bdag gi ba spu'i bu ga nas sangs rgyas byang
T02D1843:31b-22: chub sems dpa' 'am lha mo sgrol ma spros te
T02D1843:31b-23: / des phyogs bcu'i gzi brjid kyi bdud rtsi bsdus te /
T02D1843:31b-24: snying ga'i 'dod pa la phab cing dbang bskur bas
T02D1843:31b-25: mthu stobs dang dbang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur te
T02D1843:31b-26: / gzhan yang ji skad smos pa lta bur 'gyur ro //
T02D1843:31b-28: nam mkha' rdo rje srin po dang //
T02D1843:31b-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste las 'di ni
T02D1843:31b-30: bka'i 'khor lo'i skabs su bstan pa bzhin du sbyar
T02D1843:31b-31: ro // da ni las rnam pa bzhi la sogs
T02D1843:31b-32: pa bsgrub pa'i bya ba bstan pa rnams la lha
T02D1843:31b-33: rnams ji ltar bsgom pa'i cha lugs bstan pa'i phyir
T02D1843:31b-34: ro // / rnam par snang mdzad zhal gsum pa //
T02D1843:31b-35: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1843:31b-36: 'di dag ni ji ltar 'gyur nas 'byung ba bzhin du sbyar ro //
T02D1843:31b-37: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
T02D1843:31b-38: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lha gong du
T02D1843:31b-39: bstan pa rnams kyi bsgrub cing bsgom pa'i tshul bstan
T02D1843:31b-40: to // kha cig na re snga ma las cung
T02D1843:31b-41: zad mi 'dra ba'i mtshan nyid lnga pas te bstan
T02D1843:31b-42: pa yin no zhes zer ro //
T02D1843:31b-43: de la khro bo rnams dbu rgyan gyi sgo nas sku gsung thugs kyi khro bor rigs so //
T02D1843:32a-0: / da ni bka'i 'khor lo la sogs @32a * //
T02D1843:32a-1: par bstan pa'i las rnams la bskul ba'i gsang sngags ston pas /
T02D1843:32a-2: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1843:32a-3: de la dang por zhi ba'i las dang sngags bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1843:32a-4: zhi ba'i dam tshig mchog gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
T02D1843:32a-5: aom ru ru spu ru zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1843:32a-6: de la 'di ni gang zhi bar 'dod pa rnams
T02D1843:32a-7: la bdud rtsi bum pa thogs pa'i lha mo rnams
T02D1843:32a-8: kyis dbang bskur ba'i tshe rig pa 'dis bskul nas
T02D1843:32a-10: 'di ni gsungs ma thag tu yang //
T02D1843:32a-11: 'byor pa kun la dgyes pa rnams //
T02D1843:32a-12: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas spyan gyi rang gi rigs pa phyung bas /
T02D1843:32a-13: 'byor pa la dgyes pa'i lha mo dga' bar gyur
T02D1843:32a-14: nas gtso bo rjes su dran par mdzad nas zhes
T02D1843:32a-15: so // rnam gcig tu rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i
T02D1843:32a-16: rig sngags bstan pas sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par
T02D1843:32a-17: 'gyur te gtso bo rjes su dran par mdzad do
T02D1843:32a-18: so // // 'di bzhin du 'og ma kun la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1843:32a-19: sangs rgyas kun gyi 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni
T02D1843:32a-20: zhi ba bskul ba ste gong du bstan pa bzhin
T02D1843:32a-21: no // aom shang ka re la sogs pa ni
T02D1843:32a-22: stobs dang gzi brjid bskyed pa dang bsrung ba'i las
T02D1843:32a-23: no // la sbyar ba'o // aom ka te bi
T02D1843:32a-24: ka te zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags ni
T02D1843:32a-25: rgyas pa'i las la sbyar ro //
T02D1843:32a-26: aom t'a re tutt'a re zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dbang gi las la sbyar ro //
T02D1843:32a-27: drag po'i las la ni khro bo chen po gshin
T02D1843:32a-28: rje gshed la sogs pa 'di dag gi ting nge
T02D1843:32a-29: 'dzin dang sngags kyis bya ba yin te /
T02D1843:32a-30: 'di'i rim pa ni dang por dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bka'i 'khor lo bsgom ste /
T02D1843:32a-31: de'i bdag po las chos kyi 'byung gnas su gyur
T02D1843:32a-32: pa'i nang du bh'um yig 'khor lo dang bcas pa
T02D1843:32a-33: las skyes pa'i rnam par snang mdzad las /
T02D1843:32a-34: kam thod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang du gyur pa'i
T02D1843:32a-35: dbus su a'a li k'a li las skyes pa'i rdo
T02D1843:32a-36: rje sems dpa' bskyed nas de chags pa chen po
T02D1843:32a-38: de las lha mo bzhi'i dbyangs kyis bskul ba las /
T02D1843:32a-39: ji lta bu'i cho ga'i tshul gyis khro bo gshin
T02D1843:32a-40: rje gshed po la sogs pa gang yang rung bar
T02D1843:32a-41: bskyed de / rdo rje'i skye mchad dag par bya
T02D1843:32a-42: ba la sogs pa bsnyen sgrub kyi bye brag rdzogs
T02D1843:32b-0: par byas nas ting nge 'dzin gsum tshad par @32b
T02D1843:32b-1: bskyed de / bsgom ste / phra mo sbyor ba'i
T02D1843:32b-2: mthar las 'di dag brtsam par bya'o zhes bla ma'i
T02D1843:32b-3: bskyed de / bsgom ste / man ngag go //
T02D1843:32b-4: khro bo 'di dag gi yum ni m'a ma k'is
T02D1843:32b-6: de la dri ma med pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin
T02D1843:32b-7: ni zhes bya ba ni sku'i bdag nyid rnam par
T02D1843:32b-8: dag pa ste / de dbyung bar dgongs pa'i ting
T02D1843:32b-9: nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la de skad ces
T02D1843:32b-10: dag pa ste / bya'o // gzhan du yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1843:32b-11: rdo rje gshin rje gshed po 'di phyung ngo zhes
T02D1843:32b-12: bya ba ni sku gsungs thugs dbyer med pa'i phyir
T02D1843:32b-13: ro // 'dir dgug pa'i skabs su dgug pa'i sngags
T02D1843:32b-14: dang spel te thod pa bzang po'i nang du bris
T02D1843:32b-15: nas gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor bas mnan te ;
T02D1843:32b-16: gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas na lha dang lha ma
T02D1843:32b-17: yin gyi bu mo la sogs pa gang dgug par
T02D1843:32b-19: m'a ma k'i'am spyan yang rung //
T02D1843:32b-20: zhes bya ba ni khro bo'i gzungs ma ste gong du bstan pa nyid do //
T02D1843:32b-21: bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i gsang sngags gsungs pa /
T02D1843:32b-22: dam tshig 'od zer stug po mchog / ces bya
T02D1843:32b-23: ba ni las kyi bdag nyid de gzhan la ni
T02D1843:32b-25: 'dir ni bgegs bskrad pa'i snga ma'i tshul te /
T02D1843:32b-27: ma h'a ga na pa ti dz'i bi t'anta ka
T02D1843:32b-28: r'a ya zhes pas bsal la bsgrub bya'i ming bskul
T02D1843:32b-29: ba dang bcas pa gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1843:32b-30: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sngags gsungs pa /
T02D1843:32b-31: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste sangs
T02D1843:32b-32: rgyas kyi 'od zer rdo rje zhes bya ba'i thugs
T02D1843:32b-34: srin po ma rungs gtum po dang //
T02D1843:32b-35: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni srin po las
T02D1843:32b-36: 'jigs pa'i sems can rnams la khro bo 'di'i sbyor
T02D1843:32b-37: bas gzhig pa'o // rta mgrin gyi gsang sngags kyis dug gzhom pa gsungs pa /
T02D1843:32b-38: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste 'di'i
T02D1843:32b-39: sbyor ba ni rta mgrin gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis
T02D1843:32b-40: yi ge hr'i: 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyis 'og nas
T02D1843:32b-41: 'byung ba'i dug dbyung ba lta bu'i sbyor ba bya
T02D1843:32b-42: ba yin no // be con sngon po'i sngags gsungs pa //
T02D1843:32b-43: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1843:32b-44: de la rdo rje dpal 'byung ba //
T02D1843:32b-45: zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi bdag nyid do //
T02D1843:32b-46: 'di gsad pa'i las la sbyar ro //
T02D1843:32b-47: stobs po che'i sngags gsungs pa //
T02D1843:32b-48: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste //
T02D1843:32b-49: de la kun du sprin gyi dpal //
T02D1843:33a-0: zhes bya ba ni stobs dang gzi brjid kyi bdag @33a * //
T02D1843:33a-2: 'di'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni dbab pa'i las bya ba yin no //
T02D1843:33a-3: 'dod pa'i rgyal po sngags gsungs pa /
T02D1843:33a-4: de nas kun du sgrogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1843:33a-5: 'di ni dgug pa'i bdag nyid pas khyab pa'i phyir sgrogs pa'o //
T02D1843:33a-6: da ni mi g-yo ba'i sngags bstan pa'i phyir bcom
T02D1843:33a-7: ldan 'das dri ma med pa rdo rje zhes bya
T02D1843:33a-8: ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1843:33a-9: ye shes kyi bdag nyid pas de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1843:33a-10: 'di yang dgug pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1843:33a-11: gnod mdzes kyi gsang sngags gsungs pa /
T02D1843:33a-12: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1843:33a-13: dam tshig rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba ni khro bo'i las kyi bdag nyid do //
T02D1843:33a-14: de ltar khro bo bcu'i sngags bstan nas dgug pa'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1843:33a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1843:33a-17: sangs rgyas rdo rje sku gsum la //

T02D1843:33b-0: bas dgug @33b bar bsams na 'grub par 'gyur ro

T02D1843:33b-5: bsgoms te // gzhan yang rlung gi dkyil 'khor la

T02D1843:33b-13: rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'od 'bar ba'i kyo ba
T02D1843:33b-14: shin tu 'bar ba spros te nam mkha'i bu mo

T02D1843:33b-17: rang gi rigs kyi khro bo'am //
T02D1843:33b-18: rdo rje sa 'og gi ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te /
T02D1843:33b-19: thugs ka nas rdo rje dpal rtse'i kyo bas lha ma yin gyi bu mo dgug par bya'o //

T02D1843:33b-21: btsag gam rdo rgyus dag kyang rung //
T02D1843:33b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /

T02D1843:33b-24: btsag gam rdo rgyus dag zla ba gzas zin pa'i tshe /

T02D1843:33b-40: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni cho ga dang

T02D1843:34a-7: kha cig na re dgug pa tsam las gzhan du
T02D1843:34a-8: phur bu gdab pa la sogs pa byas na 'chi

T02D1843:34a-11: 'ba' zhig gi ting nge 'dzin bskul na 'grub par

T02D1843:34a-17: rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che //

T02D1843:34a-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1843:34a-24: de la 'di'i sbyor ba ni ae ka dza t'i'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas te /
T02D1843:34a-25: aom shu li ni sv'a h'a zhes pa dang /
T02D1843:34a-26: che ge mo zhig dza: / zhes bya bas klu la sogs pa'i bu mo dgug par byed do //

T02D1843:34a-30: la gnas te gsang sngags bskul ba dang bcas pa
T02D1843:34a-31: bzlas shing sbrul pas dgug par bsgoms na 'grub par

T02D1843:34a-38: sngags pas 'bum du bzlas byas na //

T02D1843:34a-42: rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang //

T02D1843:34b-1: byang chub nyid dam dngos grub rab 'bring la sogs

T02D1843:34b-4: phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi lus ngag yid
T02D1843:34b-5: gsum sku gsung thugs mnyam pa nyid du gyur par
T02D1843:34b-6: bsgoms na dgra rnams la gdon mi za'o //
T02D1843:34b-7: kha cig na re tshig 'di dag ni 'grub par nges pa'i gtan tshigs yin no zhes zer ro //
T02D1843:34b-8: da ni drag po'i brtul zhugs kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1843:34b-9: khrag dang chu yis gsher ba'am //
T02D1843:34b-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1843:34b-11: brtul zhugs lnga po 'di dag ni khro bo gang yang rung ste /
T02D1843:34b-12: 'di lta bu'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas las brtsam par bya'o //
T02D1843:34b-13: drag po'i las kyi gnas ni ma mo'i gnas sam
T02D1843:34b-14: dur khrod dam zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste
T02D1843:34b-15: gnas 'di dag ni 'byung po'i drag po'i gnas yin
T02D1843:34b-16: pa'i phyir mngon spyod la bkra shis so //

T02D1843:34b-18: ba'i las kyis gsad pa la sogs pa bya ba'i
T02D1843:34b-19: phyir mi'i rus pa las byas pa la sogs pa
T02D1843:34b-20: bstan te / de la 'di'i sbyor ba ni mi'i
T02D1843:34b-21: rus pa'i phur bu la 'og nas 'byung ba lta
T02D1843:34b-23: ji skad smos pa bzhin du btab na sangs rgyas
T02D1843:34b-24: kyang 'chi na gzhan dag lta ci smos zhes pa'i
T02D1843:34b-25: tshig go // kha cig na re /
T02D1843:34b-26: shes dang mi shes rnam spangs pa //

T02D1843:34b-28: mi shes pa ni gong du bstan pa'i rig 'dzin bsgrub pa la sogs pa yin la /

T02D1843:34b-30: 'di gnyis kas kyang phur bu 'di'i sgo nas 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro //
T02D1843:34b-31: dgra gsad pa'i sbyor ba gsungs pa /

T02D1843:34b-33: 'di'i sbyor ba ni thod pa ma nyams pa la

T02D1843:34b-35: thor tshugs gcig pa'i sngags bskul ba dang bcas pa

T02D1843:34b-37: dgra'i sgo'am grong du sbas na skrod par 'gyur ro //
T02D1843:34b-39: t'a la'i lo ma'am gzhan la'ang rung //
T02D1843:34b-40: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1843:34b-41: 'di'i sbyor ba ni khro bo'i gsang sngags bskul tshig
T02D1843:34b-42: dang bcas pa bris nas khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D1843:35a-1: ni pur bu gdab pa'i gsangs sngags dang rgyu dang ting nge 'dzin dang /

T02D1843:35a-7: mi yi rus pa'i phur bu'am //
T02D1843:35a-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni drag po'i phur bu'i rgyu bstan to //
T02D1843:35a-9: de lta bu'i phur bu de dag gdab pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1843:35a-11: rdo rje sems dpar mnyam gzhag la //
T02D1843:35a-12: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

T02D1843:35a-19: dpral ba dang dbang po sgo lnga dang yan lag

T02D1843:35a-26: ba'i don to // kha cig na re rdo rje

T02D1843:35a-31: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1843:35a-32: de la sku'i dam tshig tsham rngam gyis gnon par
T02D1843:35a-33: bya ba ni khro bo'i gzi brjid kyi tsham rngam
T02D1843:35a-34: yon tan thams cad zil gyis gnon par byed pa'o
T02D1843:35a-35: // 'di'i sbyor ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin du gnas te /

T02D1843:35a-38: sngags brjod pas thabs dang shes rab kyi 'od zer

T02D1843:35b-0: rje'i @35b rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs te sangs

T02D1843:35b-2: bzhengs te don mdzad pa la sbyor bar 'gyur la

T02D1843:35b-4: / kha cig na re sdang ba zhes bya ba'i
T02D1843:35b-5: dgra ni skrag ste 'bros pa yin la yang na
T02D1843:35b-7: 'di ni sku rdo rjer byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02D1843:35b-8: da ni gsungs rdo rjer byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir /

T02D1843:35b-10: 'di'i sbyor ba yang rdo rje chos kyi ting nge 'dzin du gnas te /
T02D1843:35b-11: ji lta ba'i phyag rgyas phur bu bsgril zhing gsang
T02D1843:35b-12: sngags brjod pas gsungs rdo rjer byin gyis brlab pa

T02D1843:35b-16: don la mnyes par gyur nas bstod pa'i phyir /
T02D1843:35b-17: ae ma'o gsang ba'i gnas kyi mchog / ces bya
T02D1843:35b-18: ba la sogs pas bstod pa yin no zhes kyang

T02D1843:35b-32: zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems ni chos kun gyi snying po thams cad bsdus pa'i don to //
T02D1843:35b-33: ae ma'o chos kyi gnas zhi ba //

T02D1843:35b-36: ae ma'o rdo rje rnam par 'joms //
T02D1843:35b-37: zhes bya ba yin no de'i phur bu sangs rgyas
T02D1843:35b-38: dang byang chub sems dpa' yang gnon par byed pa

T02D1843:36a-4: nyid de spros pa dang bral ba'i chos nyid do

T02D1843:36a-7: bar rtogs pa'i rig pa 'byung ba'o //
T02D1843:36a-8: 'di lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems kyi phur bu

T02D1843:36a-10: bsdus pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //

T02D1843:36a-18: sme sha can ni mthu chen gyi //

T02D1843:36a-22: 'dod de sngon du brjod pa'i ma dang sring mo
T02D1843:36a-23: bu mo zhes bstan pa las 'dir mar shes par
T02D1843:36a-24: bya'o // de lta bu'i gzungs ma 'di byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D1843:36a-25: mnyam pa'i mandala bdud rtsi 'khyil pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i bdud rtsi lngas skyang nul byas te /
T02D1843:36a-26: der bzhag la cho ga tshul bzhin byas te gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1843:36a-27: rdo rje 'khyil pa bsgoms pa yis /
T02D1843:36a-29: phang par bzhag nas rnam par bsgom //
T02D1843:36a-33: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1843:36a-34: sngon du brjod pa bzhin byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1843:36a-35: de ltar bsgoms pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1843:36a-36: sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje can //
T02D1843:36a-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1843:36a-39: zhes bya ba nyid du sbyar ro //
T02D1843:36a-40: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1843:36a-41: gtso blag mkhan ni mthu chen gyi ;
T02D1843:36a-42: bu mo autpala mthing ga'i mdog / ces bya ba ni sring mo ste //
T02D1843:36a-43: 'di la shes rab kyi dbang thob pa'i yum ste /
T02D1843:36a-44: de'i 'bras bu ni rdo rje 'dzin chen po yis yon tan yang /
T02D1843:36a-47: rgyal po chos rnams kun dang mtshungs //
T02D1843:36b-0: zhes @36b bya ba la sogs pa ni de'i yon
T02D1843:36b-1: tan te chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs
T02D1843:36b-2: pa'i ngo bo ste 'dod pa dang thar pa yang
T02D1843:36b-4: kha cig ni rdo rje chos kyi yon tan du 'dod do //
T02D1843:36b-5: rdo rje chos ni rab bsgoms pas //
T02D1843:36b-6: gar mkhan bu mo rab mdzes shing //
T02D1843:36b-7: bzhin bzangs mig gi dkyus ring ba //
T02D1843:36b-8: zhes bya ba ni bu mo yin te yum 'di
T02D1843:36b-9: las ni gzhan dag la dbang bskur ba'i yum byed
T02D1843:36b-11: 'di ni rdo rje chos kyi bdag / sa bcu la ni gnas par 'gyur //
T02D1843:36b-12: zhes gsungs pa yin no zhe'o //
T02D1843:36b-13: mdor na rdo rje 'dzin chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa'i yum gsum dang /
T02D1843:36b-14: rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid dbang nod cing gzhan la bskur ba'i yum gsum dang /
T02D1843:36b-15: ma dang sring mo bu mo gsum dang sku gsung
T02D1843:36b-16: thugs kyi yum gsum bdag nyid gcig tu sbyar bar
T02D1843:36b-17: bya'o // gzhan yang rigs rnam pa bzhi gang rnyed pa las kyang gzung ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1843:36b-18: bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rig dang //
T02D1843:36b-19: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1843:36b-20: rdo rje chos kyis bsgrub par bya //
T02D1843:36b-21: zhes bya ba ni 'di dag chos kyi rigs su bstan pa yin te /
T02D1843:36b-22: 'on kyang 'di ru ni rigs thams cad 'dus par shes par bya'o //
T02D1843:36b-23: gzungs de dag sgrub pa brtsam pa'i dus ni //
T02D1843:36b-24: rdo rje nyi ma nub nas ni //
T02D1843:36b-25: sgrub pa kun du brtsam par bya ;
T02D1843:36b-26: / skya rengs 'char ba'i dus su ni //
T02D1843:36b-29: 'di'i tshul ni nyi ma nub nas sgrub pa la
T02D1843:36b-30: zhugs te nam phyed man chad na rtags chen po
T02D1843:36b-32: de nas skya rengs 'char ba'i dus su dngos grub blang bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to ;
T02D1843:36b-33: /'di ni bsnyen pas rtags 'byin pa'i rnal 'byor pas dngos grub len pa'i dus bshad pa yin no //
T02D1843:36b-34: 'dir bla ma'i man ngag ni gong du bstan pa'i
T02D1843:36b-35: gzungs de lta bu la brten nas ye shes chen
T02D1843:36b-36: po dngos grub brtag pa yin te /
T02D1843:36b-37: de la rdo rje ni gsang ba'i rdo rje'o //
T02D1843:36b-38: nyi ma ni gsang ba'i padma ste //
T02D1843:36b-39: de la 'das de sbyor ba ni rdo rje nyi ma nub pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1843:36b-40: sgrub pa kun du brtsam par bya //
T02D1843:36b-41: zhes bya ba ni sgul bskyod kyi phyag rgyas byang
T02D1843:36b-42: chub kyi sems bde ba'i gnas nas h'um phat ce
T02D1843:36b-43: sa bskul pa'o // skya rengs 'char ba'i dus zhes
T02D1843:36b-44: bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen
T02D1843:37a-2: bsgom pa mchog ces bya ba ni //
T02D1843:37a-3: sems nor bu'i nang na gnas pa na bde ba chen po ye shes brtag pa'o //
T02D1843:37a-4: 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i ye shes nyams su lon par gyur pa'o //
T02D1843:37a-5: de gang gi ting nge 'dzin gyis 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1843:37a-6: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs //
T02D1843:37a-7: spos dang me tog rnams kyis brgyan //
T02D1843:37a-8: rdo rje sems dpa' mchog bsgoms na //
T02D1843:37a-9: myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D1843:37a-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1843:37a-11: dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba yis //
T02D1843:37a-12: zhes pa ni bdag yab yum sbyor ba'o //
T02D1843:37a-13: sbyor ba thams cad brtsam par bya ba ni de'i
T02D1843:37a-14: ting nge 'dzin te chos thams cad ni thabs dang
T02D1843:37a-15: shes rab kyi bdag nyid tu shes par bya'o zhes
T02D1843:37a-16: pa'i don to // de dag ni thabs dang shes
T02D1843:37a-17: rab kyi sgo nas sgrub pa yin te de yang
T02D1843:37a-18: rigs so so'i gzungs bstan pa'i zhar la bshad pa
T02D1843:37a-19: pa'i don to // yin no zhe'o // rdo rje can gyis grub 'dod na //
T02D1843:37a-20: bshad gci dam tshig bza' bar bya //
T02D1843:37a-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga bza' ba bstan te /
T02D1843:37a-22: de dag kyang thabs dang shes rab dang 'brel pa'i bdud rtsi rab tu 'grub pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1843:37a-23: bshad gci'i dam tshig la sogs pas //
T02D1843:37a-24: dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba yis //
T02D1843:37a-25: sangs rgyas byang chub gnas zhi ba //
T02D1843:37a-26: de nyid bla na med pa 'grub //
T02D1843:37a-28: da ni drag po'i las la sogs pa bstan pas
T02D1843:37a-29: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te
T02D1843:37a-30: / de la las 'di dag byed pa'i tshe khro
T02D1843:37a-31: bo gang yang rung bas gtso bo byas pa'am zhe
T02D1843:37a-32: sdang rdo rjes byas kyang rung ste /
T02D1843:37a-33: khro bo bcu'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas 'og nas 'byung
T02D1843:37a-34: ba'i las rnams la sbyar ro zhes shes par bya'o
T02D1843:37a-35: // de la 'dir gshin rje gshed kyis bu mo dgug pa bstan te /
T02D1843:37a-36: gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas thab
T02D1843:37a-37: khung gru gsum byas te tsher ma'i shing la me
T02D1843:37a-38: spar nas dug dang mi'i khrag dang lan tshva dang
T02D1843:37a-39: skye tshe la sogs pa gdug pa'i rdzas rnams la
T02D1843:37a-40: sems khros pa dang bcas pas nyi ma gung ngam
T02D1843:37a-41: nam phyed na bsreg par bya ste /
T02D1843:37a-42: aom hr'i:sht'i:bi kri t'a na na sarba sha tr'um ni
T02D1843:37a-43: sha ya stambha ya h'um h'um bu mo che ge
T02D1843:37a-44: mo phat sv'a h'a zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis bsreg
T02D1843:37a-45: cing nyi ma gsum du las 'di byas na /
T02D1843:37a-46: bskal ba grangs med pa gsum du yang du mo
T02D1843:37b-0: 'byung bar @37b 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1843:37b-1: // bcu bzhi 'am yang na tshes brgyad la //
T02D1843:37b-2: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dgug pa'i rdzas
T02D1843:37b-3: bstan pa yin te sngon du bstan pa ltar bcu
T02D1843:37b-4: bzhi'am tshes brgyad la dur khrod kyi sol ba blangs
T02D1843:37b-5: la cho ga bzhin du byas te zla ba gzas
T02D1843:37b-6: zin pa'i tshe khar bcug ste gsang sngags bzlas pa
T02D1843:37b-7: byas nas / de nas gdul bya'i ming la sogs
T02D1843:37b-8: pa bris na gdul bya 'dul bar 'gyur bar gdon
T02D1843:37b-9: byas nas / mi za'o // gsang sngags shes pas bsgoms nas ni //
T02D1843:37b-10: gang yang rung ba'i ri mo bri //
T02D1843:37b-11: zhes bya ba ni sngon du bstan pa bzhin no //
T02D1843:37b-12: tho ba zhi ba la bsgoms nas //
T02D1843:37b-13: zhes bya ba ni bdag khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D1843:37b-14: du gnas pa las sprul ba thob thogs pa mang
T02D1843:37b-15: po byung ste / gang la bya ba'i gzugs brnyan
T02D1843:37b-16: la brdeg par bsgoms na 'di yis 'dul bar 'gyur
T02D1843:37b-17: po byung ste / bas / sbyor ba dag gis nges par ltung //
T02D1843:37b-20: h'um ni rab tu 'bar dang bcas //
T02D1843:37b-21: zhes pa ste 'di'i sbyor ba ni khro bo'i sbyor
T02D1843:37b-22: bas sbrul pa'i pho nya rnams kyi lag na h'um
T02D1843:37b-23: las bskyed pa'i rdo rje thogs pas bsgrub bya gzhig
T02D1843:37b-26: rdo rgyus sol ba la sogs pas //
T02D1843:37b-27: skyes pa'am bud med kyi gzugs bris la //
T02D1843:37b-28: zhes bya bas ling ga byas te /
T02D1843:37b-29: bdag gi sprul pa lag na ster thogs pa rnams
T02D1843:37b-30: kyis ling ga la bstims pa'i bsgrub bya'i ming pa
T02D1843:37b-31: bcad par bsgoms na gang yang rung ste snad pa'am
T02D1843:37b-33: las kyi rdo rje rab 'bar ba /
T02D1843:37b-34: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mnan pa'i las yin te /
T02D1843:37b-35: 'di ni 'og gi rlung dang char ba bcad pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1843:37b-36: 'di'i sbyor ba ni bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i ting nge
T02D1843:37b-37: 'dzin du bzhugs nas rlung ngam tshar pa yang rung
T02D1843:37b-38: ste gang yang rung ba'i mdun du bsams te /
T02D1843:37b-39: de'i steng du las kyi rdo rje rgya gram gyis
T02D1843:37b-40: mnan pa'i dbus na rdo rje 'greng bus mtshan pa
T02D1843:37b-41: bsams nas gdug pa'i dgra aa mri ta kunda li
T02D1843:37b-42: dran par byas na sangs rgyas kyi sbrul pa'ang 'jig
T02D1843:37b-44: da ni gong du smos pa'i gzugs dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid dang /
T02D1843:37b-45: byang chub kyi sems spro zhing byin gyis brlabs pa'i
T02D1843:37b-46: yi ge rnams ston pas de la sngags 'di ni
T02D1843:37b-47: thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po'o //
T02D1843:38a-2: 'di'i sbyor ba ni bdag gtso bo yab yum gyi sku phyag rgya chen po bskyed de /
T02D1843:38a-3: mkha' gsang rnam pa gnyis byin gyis brlab pa'i tshe
T02D1843:38a-4: rdo rje'i sbu gu'i nang na byang chub kyi sems
T02D1843:38a-5: spro ba'i phat nag po yod pa'o //
T02D1843:38a-6: ye shes sems dpa' sbyor ba yis ;
T02D1843:38a-7: / dbus su gzugs ni bsgom par bya //
T02D1843:38a-8: zhes bya pa ni bdag nyid ye shes sems dpa' dang ldan pa'i gtso bor bskyed pa'o //
T02D1843:38a-9: sngags shes pas ni gnas bzhi ru //
T02D1843:38a-10: bud med rtag tu gzhag par bya //
T02D1843:38a-11: zhes bya ba ni mtshams kyi lha mo bshes gnyen ma bzhi rtag tu gnas pa nyid do//
T02D1843:38a-12: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs //
T02D1843:38a-13: mtshan rnams thams cad kyis ni mtshan //
T02D1843:38a-14: zhes bya ba ni lha mo'i yon tan no //
T02D1843:38a-15: padmo rab tu rgyas byas nas //
T02D1843:38a-16: sngags kyi rnam par bsgom par bya //
T02D1843:38a-17: h'um zhes bya ba ni h'um gis padma dang rdo rje byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1843:38a-18: rang lus dag sems rdo rje la //
T02D1843:38a-19: phab na byang chub thob par 'gyur //
T02D1843:38a-20: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems bab pa'i yon tan no //
T02D1843:38a-21: kha cig na re bdag ye shes sbyor ba dang
T02D1843:38a-22: ldan pa'i mtshan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i bud
T02D1843:38a-23: med bzhir rgyan gyis brgyan te yum bzhir byin gyis
T02D1843:38a-24: brlabs nas phyogs bzhir bzhag ste gnyis su med pa'i
T02D1843:38a-25: sbyor bas padmo rgyas par byas nas /
T02D1843:38a-26: h'um zhes byang chub kyi sems dbab cing phat ces pas byang chub kyi sems spro bar bya'o zhe'o //
T02D1843:38a-27: bzhin bzangs phan par 'dod pa yis //
T02D1843:38a-28: bud med rnyed nas cho ga bzhin //
T02D1843:38a-29: dben par mchod pa brtsam par bya //
T02D1843:38a-30: zhes bya ba ni gong du bstan pa'i gsang ba'i sbyor ba de tshul 'di lta bur byas te /
T02D1843:38a-31: gsang ba byang chub kyi sems sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i
T02D1843:38a-32: bdag nyid dam rang gi rigs kyi sbyor bas 'thungs
T02D1843:38a-33: te rnam par mi rtog par byas na ji skad
T02D1843:38a-35: bshad ba'am yang na 'bras chan nam //
T02D1843:38a-36: sha ngag kyang ni gzhug par bya //
T02D1843:38a-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bdud rtsi ri lu sgrub pa'i cho ga lhag ma bstan te /
T02D1843:38a-38: 'di'i sbyor ba ni bshang ba dang 'bras chan byang
T02D1843:38a-39: chub kyi sems dang sha rnam pa lnga dag las
T02D1843:38a-40: rang gi rigs kyi sha gcig dang /
T02D1843:38a-41: de rnams bsres te ri lu bya yang na bshad ba ni bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga ste /
T02D1843:38b-0: de dag dang 'bras chan nyid @38b dang ;
T02D1843:38b-1: rigs kyi sha gang yang rung ba zhig dang bdun
T02D1843:38b-2: du sbyar te ri lu byas la de bha gar
T02D1843:38b-3: bzhag ste bsgoms nas mtshan ma thob par sbyar ba
T02D1843:38b-4: byas te byang chub kyi sems dang bcas te zos
T02D1843:38b-5: na sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi mthong bar 'gyur ro
T02D1843:38b-6: // gzhan gsungs pa gsang ba cho ga bzhin blangs la //
T02D1843:38b-7: kham phor sbyar mar gzhag par bya //
T02D1843:38b-8: zhes bya ba gsungs pa ste /
T02D1843:38b-9: 'di'i sbyor ba ni bshad ba dang mar khu sbyar te bandh'i 'dzag phor cig tu blugs la /
T02D1843:38b-10: 'og tu bandha bzang po zhig bzed de /
T02D1843:38b-11: de la gsang sngags brgya tsa brgyad bzlas nas zos na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1843:38b-12: de bzhin du mi snang ba'i thabs 'di dag kun
T02D1843:38b-13: kyang 'di lta bu'i sbyor bas byin gyis brlabs te
T02D1843:38b-14: mtshan ma thob pa dang zos na mi snang bar
T02D1843:38b-15: 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D1843:38b-16: kha cig 'dod pa ni bshang ba zhes 'byung ba dang /
T02D1843:38b-17: bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga tshang ba yin te /
T02D1843:38b-18: 'di dang sha rnam pa lngar re re sbyar te ril lu bya'o zhes 'dod do //
T02D1843:38b-19: ga bur tsandan sbyar ba yi //
T02D1843:38b-20: ri lu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa //
T02D1843:38b-21: zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems kyi dang padma rakta sbyar ba'o //
T02D1843:38b-22: rnam gcig tu tsandan ni bshang ba yin te de la ri lu bya'o //
T02D1843:38b-23: kha cig ni ga phur tsandan nyid du 'dod do //
T02D1843:38b-24: gi wang aa ga ru sbyar ba'o //
T02D1843:38b-25: ri lu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa //
T02D1843:38b-26: zhes bya ba ni bshad pa dang dri chur sbyar ba'o //
T02D1843:38b-27: ga pur gur gum sbyar ba yis //
T02D1843:38b-28: zhes bya ba ni bshad pa dang khu bar sbyar ba'o //
T02D1843:38b-29: kha cig ni 'di dag dngos bzhin du 'dod de ji ltar yang 'gal ba ma yin no //
T02D1843:38b-30: de lta bu'i sgrub pa de dag kyang rdo rje
T02D1843:38b-31: 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin nam rang gi rigs kyi
T02D1843:38b-32: lha'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bya bar bstan pa'i phyir
T02D1843:38b-33: / rdo rje 'dzin pa 'am gang yang rung //
T02D1843:38b-34: phyag rgya chen por byin brlabs na /
T02D1843:38b-35: de ni dpal dang ldan pa yi //
T02D1843:38b-38: de nyid kyi yon tan ni //
T02D1843:38b-39: 'dod khams pa yi bu mo ni //
T02D1843:38b-40: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te lha'i bu mo dag la 'dod pa spyod par 'gyur ro //
T02D1843:38b-41: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad don de
T02D1843:38b-42: la mnyes par gyur nas ngo mtshar gyi tshig gsungs
T02D1843:38b-43: pa ni / ae ma'o rab tu ngo mtshar che //
T02D1843:38b-44: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1843:39a-0: mi gtsang ba'i rdzas rnams kyang @39a * //
T02D1843:39a-1: dngos grub kyi rgyur gyur pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag par gsungs pa ngo mtshar ro zhes so //
T02D1843:39a-2: da ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la rang gi
T02D1843:39a-3: rigs kyi phyag rgyas rgyas gdab pa bstan pa'i phyir
T02D1843:39a-4: / de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1843:39a-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1843:39a-7: sangs rgyas rdo rje can rnams kun //
T02D1843:39a-8: rdo rje'i sbyor bas mnyes par 'gyur //
T02D1843:39a-9: zhes bya ba ni rigs lnga sangs rgyas la rdo
T02D1843:39a-10: rje 'dzin pa'i dbu rgyan byas na de dag mnyes
T02D1843:39a-11: par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1843:39a-12: sangs rgyas rdo rje rab dbye bas //
T02D1843:39a-14: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin pa rigs lnga'i dbye ba zhig gis dbu rgyan byas pa ste /
T02D1843:39a-15: de la rdo rje 'dzin pa ni rgyu yin la
T02D1843:39a-16: rigs lnga ni de zhu ba las bskyed pa'i phyir
T02D1843:39a-18: de dag phan tshun gdab pa ni 'di skad du /
T02D1843:39a-19: rgyu la 'bras bus rgyas gdab cing //
T02D1843:39a-20: 'bras bu la yang rgyus rgyas gdab //
T02D1843:39a-22: rdo rje can gyi gzugs la sogs //
T02D1843:39a-23: gtsug tor mnyes par byed pa yin //
T02D1843:39a-24: zhes bya ba ni rigs lnga'i dbye ba de ni
T02D1843:39a-25: rdo rje 'dzin mnyes par byed par ma zad kyi
T02D1843:39a-26: rdo rje can gyi gzugs la sogs pa ste /
T02D1843:39a-27: lha mo thams cad kyi gtsug tor du yang mtshan zhing mnyes par byed pa yin no zhes pa'o //
T02D1843:39a-28: khro bo rnams las de mchog ste //
T02D1843:39a-29: zhes pa ni khro bo bcu po bsgoms pa rnams

T02D1843:45a-29: du rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi dbang la bstan par

T02D1843:45a-36: zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi dbang ngo //
